pages.text: <li>accepts fluids from pipes on the back (brighter side without arrows)<li>if given a redstone signal it will extract from tanks and machines<li>connects to a <l>(transport/pipe)pressure pipe</l> on the front (darker side with arrows)

<li>will only accept fluids if a valid output is connected with a high pressure pipe<li>if multiple outputs are connected it will do it's best to distribute the fluid evenly<li>can be <l>(transport/filtering)filtered</l>
